body:
File: runtime/runtime-scopes.cc
Runtime slow-paths and with-scope helpers:
- RUNTIME_FUNCTION(Runtime_PushWithContext): NewWithContext(current, scope_info, extension_object) creates With context; used by CreateWithContext lowering and Ignition handler.
- RUNTIME_FUNCTION(Runtime_LoadLookupSlot): RETURN_RESULT_OR_FAILURE(isolate, LoadLookupSlot(isolate, name, kThrowOnError));
- RUNTIME_FUNCTION(Runtime_LoadLookupSlotInsideTypeof): same with kDontThrow.
- RUNTIME_FUNCTION_RETURN_PAIR(Runtime_LoadLookupSlotForCall): returns (value, receiver) for calls; also Baseline variant returns into stack slots.
- RUNTIME_FUNCTION(Runtime_StoreLookupSlot_Sloppy): StoreLookupSlot(..., LanguageMode::kSloppy).
- RUNTIME_FUNCTION(Runtime_StoreLookupSlot_Strict): StoreLookupSlot(..., LanguageMode::kStrict).
- RUNTIME_FUNCTION(Runtime_StoreLookupSlot_SloppyHoisting): StoreLookupSlot(..., kSloppy, DONT_FOLLOW_CHAINS) to hoist in eval legacy sloppy.
- RUNTIME_FUNCTION(Runtime_DeleteLookupSlot): deletes a name through the scope chain if possible, respects attributes; returns boolean.
Core helpers:
- static MaybeHandle<Object> LoadLookupSlot(Isolate*, Handle<String> name, ShouldThrow, Handle<Object>* receiver_return=nullptr): walks scope chain via Context::Lookup to find binding; handles module variables; checks uninitialized bindings; returns value or throws ReferenceError based on ShouldThrow. Also determines receiver for call case (undefined for globals/context extension, holder for with subject); may run property access on holder for non-context.
- static MaybeHandle<Object> StoreLookupSlot(Isolate*, Handle<Context> context, Handle<String> name, Handle<Object> value, LanguageMode, ContextLookupFlags=FOLLOW_CHAINS): similar lookup and store semantics; handles const errors and strict mode; adds property on global if absent in sloppy mode; stores to script context with side-data update when const_tracking_let/script_context_mutable_heap_number flags are enabled.
explanation: This entry logs all runtime slow paths related to lookup slots and with-context creation and deletion. These are the targets for the runtime calls emitted by Ignition and BytecodeGraphBuilder. The helpers explain receiver resolution for calls and the semantics for typeof and strict/sloppy handling.
file_line: runtime/runtime-scopes.cc: multiple; LoadLookupSlot/StoreLookupSlot implementations and RUNTIME_FUNCTION wrappers
